overview: Grubby and John are back… but not as we know them… things take a decided turn for the bizarre in ER’s 15th film (yes, more than usual), as our intrepid heroes enter their own pasts to search for the missing chilli tea recipe.  Journeying from woodlands, to film sets, to precarious cliff edges; things only get weirder, more convoluted and more meta in this love letter to the ER work ethic and their unusual obsession with their own mythos.
title: Grubby Forever
